data.message: Hello facebook, i want to get a piece of information. for three days i get post of my friends about some copyrights and privacy policy issues. They says that facebook is going to publish publicaly our posts and pics videos and also deleted posts. I think its not true cause i have read all the privacy police and also copyright section. but i still want just to conform. this is one post i get from one of my friend. https://www.facebook.com/plugins/post.php?href=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2Fmuhammad.xahidan%2Fposts%2F1144126508979753

replies.message: Hey 	Ziaullah. Thanks for checking in with us. This sounds like a hoax. If you see content like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: http://bit.ly/297SHUm. -Jordan
thank you i will make sure Mr Jordan
